caption: Geo Location
name: location
description: The location object describes a detailed geographical location, usually associated with an IP address.

desc.description: The description of the geographical location.

geo_location.description: The city, state and country of the location.

provider.description: The provider of the geographical location data.

region.description: The alphanumeric code that identifies the principal subdivision (e.g. province or state) of the country. Region codes are defined at ISO 3166-2 and have a limit of three characters. For examples, see the region codes for the US.
